fr.umlv.escape.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the Escape game. It initialize and manage all the progress of the game

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Game.State
      Enum that represent the state of the game

      • setCurrentNbLv

        public void setCurrentNbLv(int currentNbLv)
        Set the current level number. If this method is called while a level is running, the current level will be cleared and the new one will begin.
        Parameters:
        currentNbLv - the new level number.
